field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable this zone.

field.label: Zone Name
field.help: Set the name for this zone. Both forward and reverse zones may be specified, i.e. example.com or 0.168.192.in-addr.arpa.

field.label: Allow Transfer
field.help: Define the ACLs where you allow which server can retrieve this zone.

field.label: Allow Query
field.help: Define the ACLs where you allow which client are allowed to query this zone.

field.label: Primary IP
field.help: Set the IP address of primary server.

field.label: Transfer Key Algorithm
field.help: Set the authentication algorithm for the TSIG key used to transfer domain data from the primary server.

field.label: Transfer Key Name
field.help: The name of the TSIG key, which must match the value on the primary server.

field.label: Transfer Key
field.help: The TSIG key used to transfer domain data from the master server in Base64 encoding.

field.label: Allow Notfiy
field.help: A list of allowed IP addresses to receive notifies from (in addition to the primary server.)
